attributes.action: Ban the standing charge in taxis
attributes.additional_details:
As soon as a passenger steps into a taxi, and before the taxi has moved, there is already a charge on the meter.  Why?  The cost per mile is already excessive, so this additional 'standing charge' is a rip-off and is a taxi tax.  If you enter a supermarket, and spend £20 on food, you do not expect to pay an additional charge (of £3.60 plus), just because you have entered the shop.

Ban the standing charge in taxis.  Ban the taxi tax.  Fair fees for fares.
